page.title: 13RECREATION AND INDUSTRY
page.content:
{30%}did not do any sports at all and the remaining people did hardly any sports or leisure activities.This is mainly because there are not adequate facilities in this area.The conclusion that can be drawn from this information we have is that given a swimming pool and night club the area would be quite adequately served.
{INDUSTRY
In Hartlepool there has been high unemployment in the last{15}years because a large part of the steelworks has closed down,and also because docks cannot handle large ships.
